name: Two flags
description:
Two flags is one flag to much. Take your brave knight and beat your way through all foes standing in the way. There shall only be one flag as ruler.

A short litle game i made for weekly game jam 153 with the theme roll. Your playing as a knight that can roll to avoid arrows and hits.

Made with clickteam fusion 2.5
Artwork with built in editor
Sound effects with Bfxr
Music midi by me converted to mp3.

Enjoy!
